title: How to Learn JavaScript
Content: Learn modern JavaScript (ES2015+) from scratch, and practice in an intuitive environment. The challenges are inspired by real-world projects to make sure that you're learning the best practices, one step at a time. Try the first 77 lessons, challenges, projects (first 7 chapters) & flashcards for free. You can upgrade to a Pro account with a one-time payment that gives you access for 5 years
author: Shrikant Jha
